items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Material and fit
items.body: Perfect fit and great quality Read more
items.author: Tee Bee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Sweater, Questionable Sizing Adventure
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater that has a really good feel to it when sampling it with my hand. On the body it felt just a tad itchy. It is absolutely true-to-color, but unfortunately it is about as far off the mark that one can get as far as true-to-size. We knew it was a slim-fitting sweater when I ordered it. My wife wanted me to order a medium, but I ordered a large because the majority of the time, in my experience, these wears made in a certain place tend to run smaller. After she berated me for ordering the large, we took it out of the package and it was immediately obvious that there was no way the large was even going to fit her. The sweater was so small that we had our nine-year-old daughter try it on. She is about as small and skinny as a nine-year-old girl gets, and the sweater just about fit her perfect. The only issues were the v-neck and the sleeves, but the sleeves are easily pushed up as the sweater is skin tight everywhere. SO, I love the sweater, but I’d recommend ordering one that’s a few sizes larger than what you would normally wear unless you have a significantly smaller than average torso, or you want to wear it above your belly button (which I’m sure would look super cute on you!). Read more
items.author: Jacen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for using as under layer !!
items.body: This sweater is some great quality fabric it’s thick soft and warm perfect to use as under layer during cold weather. It stretches well without losing shape and it stayed exact same after couple washes. The color is beautiful and the V neck style is very cute and it’s perfect fit true to size. Read more
items.author: Almamy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Comfy Cable Knit Sweater
items.body: This cable knit sweater is cute and comfy. The color is a soft pink and is lightweight yet warm. It does crawl up a bit on the stomach but it isn’t too bothersome. Perfect for everyday wear and can be dressed up. Read more
items.author: Shakira

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, cozy, pretty sweater
items.body: The first time I wore this sweater, I got so many complements! This sweater is warm and fitted but breathable and so soft. It’s definitely a staple item for any wardrobe. I am definitely ordering more in other colors! Read more
items.author: Happy_Bean

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft form fitting light sweater
items.body: This is a very soft sweater. It has high quality craftsmanship. However, it is lighter than I expected and size wise it is smaller than anticipated, but the fabric does stretch out to fit (form fitting). It has a nice design, overall I'm fairly pleased with it. Read more
items.author: tschuck

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft cable knit style. Great for layering
items.body: The media could not be loaded. So soft and stretchy! Ordered a medium and it does fit however It looked sized for a 10-year-old at first but it does have so much stretch that it will fit. 5’8” 140lbs. I’m normally a size 4 torso and the medium was OK. The material and quality are very nice and I did love the cream color. Light to medium thickness and extremely soft and luxurious feel. sleeve and torso Length worked well. This provides a very fitted look. Read more
items.author: Derf

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small but soft and warm
items.body: This sweater runs smaller than expected, so size up if you're between sizes. That said, the material is soft and the pink color is really nice not too bright, not too pale. It's warm enough for fall weather and the cable knit texture looks good. Just know you'll need to account for the sizing issue when ordering. Read more
items.author: Justalady

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Deep Red, Deep Brown, Dark Grey, Black, Dark Green, Brown Solid, Pink, White, Beige, Dark Blue, Butter Yellow, Light Pink, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
